detailsData.title: Professional
detailsData.content: Typos, late filings, untimely responses to emails. Sound familiar? Not here!

detailsData.title: Warm
detailsData.content: Dealing with legal issues is not fun. The law can be very cold. Your lawyer doesn't have to be.

detailsData.title: Effective
detailsData.content: All the advice in the world is irrelevant if it doesn't produce results. It needs to work.

subHeading: Professional, warm, and effective legal representation
valueProp: Our firm is dedicated to providing professional, warm, and effective legal representation. We understand that dealing with legal issues can be stressful, and we strive to make the process as smooth as possible for our clients.
CTA: Call us at 914-269-8203 for a free consultation!

testimonalData.text: Matt is my go to lawyer. He has been there for me and so many of my teammates over the years.
testimonalData.author: Dwight Gooden

testimonalData.text: Matt is a strategic thinker and really knows how to analyze and formulate a litigation game plan.
testimonalData.author: Phil Regan

testimonalData.text: I heard other players saying amazing things about Matt and now I know for myself that it's all true as he never quits until the catch is made!
testimonalData.author: Endy Chavez, NY Mets Player
